snippet.title: PS4, XB1, PC | The Dark Pictures: Little Hope - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
What happens in the past, never stays buried. Your tour of Little Hope begins this summer.

The Dark Pictures Anthology is a series of stand-alone, cinematic horror games, designed to present a new terrifying experience on a regular basis. Each game is unconnected and will feature a brand-new story, setting and new cast of characters.

The Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope will launch this summer 2020 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC Digital via STEAM for Southeast Asia.
